blogPost.excerpt: Auth. is a 2FA and OTP management tool for everyone. Works with all Apple personal devices - support handoff and keychain. Scan the QR Code and Done! Or you may add your account manually from your provider. Safari extension is also available for auto-fill-in.
blogPost.body: Auth. is a 2FA and OTP management tool for everyone. Works with all Apple personal devices - support handoff and keychain. Scan the QR Code and Done! Or you may add your account manually from your provider. Safari extension is also available for auto-fill-in.
blogPost.title: auth. - 2FA , MFA, OTP, Secure Code for Apple devices
blogPost.author: MING

localize.description: Auth.是一款适合所有人使用的2FA和OTP管理工具。适用于所有苹果个人设备--支持交接和钥匙扣。扫描二维码就可以了! 或者你可以从你的供应商手动添加你的帐户。Safari扩展也可用于自动填写。
Auth.是一款適合所有人使用的2FA和OTP管理工具。適用於所有蘋果個人設備--支持交接和鑰匙扣。掃描二維碼就可以了! 或者你可以從你的供應商手動添加你的帳戶。Safari擴展也可用於自動填寫。

previous.excerpt: Infracost is an open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests. When you change your infrastructure code (Terraform), we post a comment in the pull request, telling you the impact to your cloud bill, e.g. “this will increase your bill by 25% next month”.
previous.title: Infracost - Open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests

localize.description: Infracost是一个开源的云成本估算器，在拉取请求中。当你更改基础设施代码（Terraform）时，我们会在拉取请求中发布一条评论，告诉你对云计算账单的影响，例如 "这将使你下个月的账单增加25%"。
localize.tagline: 拉请求中的开源云成本估算器

localize.description: Infracost是一個開源的雲成本估算器，在拉取請求中。當你更改基礎設施代碼（Terraform）時，我們會在拉取請求中發佈一條評論，告訴你對雲計算賬單的影響，例如 "這將使你下個月的賬單增加25%"。
localize.tagline: 拉請求中的開源雲成本估算器

next.title: HomeFitness OS - The all-in-one fitness system for Notion

localize.description: 实现你的健身目标所需的一切：预填的锻炼数据库，可通过设备和健身水平过滤，运动和营养记录，日历等。
實現你的健身目標所需的一切：預填的鍛鍊數據庫，可通過設備和健身水平過濾，運動和營養記錄，日曆等。
